about_the_game:
Tricky Tracks is a multiplayer hide & seek game with a twist: Footprints!
SEEKER track them, RUNNER leave them and both teams have to cleverly use them to their advantage



Various different maps & unique Heroes


Play with different Heroes each with their own unique look and individual abilities. Are you more of a nimble and stealthy cucumber, or rather a strong and persistent robot or are you the smartest Detective in Old London?

The maps are also brimming with diversity:
  • Play in a cartoony looking Kitchen Map, that is frozen in time
  • Roam the dark, misty alleys of Old London
  • Take advantage of the vastness of the Industrial Map
  • Explore the undergrounds of a Dwarven Dungeon

These and more exciting maps are waiting to be explored and ensure a high replay value.



Confuse all your chasers as a RUNNER


Each team has unique and fun skills! As a RUNNER it is all about confusing the other team. You can lay fake tracks, rewind back in time to choose a different path and hide in props that are scattered around the map. It is up to you how you turn the footprints you leave behind into your strongest weapon against the SEEKER!



Play tactical and ice-cold as a SEEKER

As a SEEKER you have to keep a clear mind! Don't let the opposing team fool you. See through the tricks they are playing on you and hunt them down as fast as possible. When playing as a SEEKER, Tricky Tracks offers you special abilities which the other team does not have. With them, you have tactical advantage and together with your team mates you have all it needs.

Feature Overview

  • Two different teams: RUNNER and SEEKER
  • RUNNER can hide in props, lay fake tracks and rewind in time
  • SEEKER can scan the entire map, shoot markers, lay traps and have small aids to give them tactical advantage
  • Each character is a Hero with different traits, style, abilities and also their own little backstory
  • Cartoony Kitchen Map: Chef "Gaston" VS Cucumber "Benedict"
  • Spacious Industrial Map: Mechanic Girl "Sarah" VS Robot "Adam"
  • Spooky Old London Map: Detective "Sir Locke" VS Evildoer "Jacky"
detailed_description:
Looking for other players? Join our Discord!

name: Tricky Tracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7.1 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7.1 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Tricky Tracks is a fun and exciting multiplayer hide & seek game with a twist: As a RUNNER, you leave footprints! Handle them cleverly and confuse your chasers while you're running and hiding. Or as a SEEKER: Don't let them fool you! Hunt down the opposing team with tactical advantage at your hands.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
